src:
Voznik zapeljal v plinohram, posredovali gasilci
Kritičnih poškodb in uhajanja plina gasilci niso zaznali.
05 Nov 2019, 12:18 by P. K.
NEVLJE – V ponedeljek ob 23.38 je v Nevljah v občini Kamnik osebno vozilo zapeljalo na podzemni plinohram. Posredovali so gasilci PGD Kamnik, vozilo odstranili s plinohrama in preverili poškodbe na rezervoarju plina.Kritičnih poškodb in uhajanja plina gasilci niso zaznali, zato si bo poškodbe ogledal uslužbenec pristojne plinarne, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.
text:
The driver drove to the gas station, fire officials said
Critical damage and gas leaks were not detected by firefighters.
05 Nov 2019, 12:18 by P.K.
NEVLJE - A motor vehicle drove into an underground gas station in Nevlje, Kamnik municipality, at 11.38pm on Monday. PGD Kamnik firefighters intervened, removed the vehicle from the gas station and checked for damage to the gas tank. Critical damage and gas leaks were not detected, so the employee will be examined by a competent gas station staff, the Protection and Rescue Administration reports.
